references: Related: Ord 7889, Ord 40083, Ord 16699, CF 14343, CF 53874
summary: An ordinance granting to Puget Sound Power and Light Company, a corporation, its successors and assigns, the right, privilege and authority to lay down, replace, renew, maintain and operate pipes and conduits in and along certain streets, avenues, alleys and public places in the City of Seattle and by means thereof to transmit, sell and deliver steam for heating purposes and for steam power and charge and collect reasonable rates, tolls and competition therefor, and repealing Ordinances Nos. 7889, 40083, 16699, 14343 and 53874.
